00019 class Galleria_Auto_Configure
00020 {
00021 
00032     public static function configFiles($elements)
00033     {
00034         $configuration = array();
00035         foreach ($elements as $element) {
00036             $configDataDist = self::_distFileData($element);
00037             $configDataLocal = self::_userFileData($element);
00038             $configData = array_merge( (array) $configDataDist, (array) $configDataLocal );
00039             $configuration[$element] = $configData;
00040         }
00041         return Galleria_Configuration::set($configuration);
00042     }
00043 
00054     private static function _fileExists($name)
00055     {
00056         return (file_exists($name)) ? require_once $name : array();
00057     }
00058 
00069     private static function _distFileData($element)
00070     {
00071         return self::_fileExists(PATH_DATA_CONFIG . '/' . $element . '.dist.php');
00072     }
00073 
00084     private static function _userFileData($element)
00085     {
00086         return self::_fileExists(PATH_DATA_CONFIG . '/' . $element . '.php');
00087     }
00088 
00089 }
